1.message:
AssertionError: Expected invalid or unknown: UNC path without scheme (\\server\share\file.txt)
       assert (not True or <URLType.INTERNAL: 1> == <URLType.UNKNOWN: 3>)
        +  where True = URLInfo(raw='\\server\share\file.txt', normalized='https://example.com/docs/server/share/file.txt', status='valid').is_valid
        +  and   <URLType.INTERNAL: 1> = URLInfo(raw='\\server\share\file.txt', normalized='https://example.com/docs/server/share/file.txt', status='valid').url_type
        +  and   <URLType.UNKNOWN: 3> = URLType.UNKNOWN

3.test_name: test_windows_path_handling[file:///C:/Users/User/Documents/file.html-None-None-File scheme with absolute Windows path - now disallowed]

5.message:
AssertionError: URL should be valid: Relative path traversal with backslashes (..\other\file.html)
       assert False
        +  where False = URLInfo(raw='..\other\file.html', normalized='https://example.com/docs/folder/..\other\file.html', status='invalid (Path traversal attempt detected)').is_valid
